author: Nintendo of America
description:
FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 on Jan 22, 2026. Pre-order today:  https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/limited-early-purchase-editionfinal-fantasy-vii-remake-intergrade-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Discover Midgar and the factions that bring the story to life in the first part of the FINAL FANTASY VII remake series.  

This edition includes two incredible adventures: 
- FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE, focusing on ex-SOLDIER Cloud Strife.  
- An additional episode, FF7R INTERmission, starring the spirited ninja Yuffie Kisaragi.  

As a bonus, the digital editions come with the original FINAL FANTASY VII game for early purchasers! Please visit Nintendo eShop for more details.  

#NintendoSwitch2 #FinalFantasyVIIRemake #FF7R 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.c
title: FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE – World & Factions – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
BALL x PIT launches on Nintendo Switch on Oct 15, 2025 and Nintendo Switch 2 this fall of 2025.  

BALL x PIT is a brick-breaking, ball-fusing, base-building survival roguelite. Develop arcane ammunition and resources in pursuit of treasure, recruiting additional heroes to aid you in your perilous quest. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #BALLxPIT 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: BALL x PIT – Five Outstanding Evolutions – Nintendo Switch 2
